title: Spruce MD | Integrative Medicine in Greenville, SC
description: We have the most skilled integrative medicine doctors in the Upstate. At Spruce MD, you're more than just a name, and your doctors are your trusted allies.
cleaned_text: A BRILLIANT WAY TO CARE. We believe in establishing long term relationships with patients who are active in their care. At Spruce MD, our providers closely partner with patients to create individualized health goals and then motivate change through open communication and accountability. We can even schedule online appointments so that you can see our integrative doctor virtually when you're traveling or ill at home.
